remarks: If the property ` A ` is preserved under topological products, then so is the property of being locally ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)
statement:
txlly.1 $e |- ( ( j e. A /\ k e. A ) -> ( j tX k ) e. A ) $.
txlly $p |- ( ( R e. Locally A /\ S e. Locally A ) -> ( R tX S ) e. Locally A ) $.
$d A j k $.
$d R j k $.
$d S k $.
